body_html: This would be a great feature to have! You're right - currently we wait till the MatchingFilesOp succeeds and we get all the files. One potential idea would be to create an iterator over the output of GetMatchingFiles and stream that into the downstream ops. @mrry for more ideas.
body_text: This would be a great feature to have! You're right - currently we wait till the MatchingFilesOp succeeds and we get all the files. One potential idea would be to create an iterator over the output of GetMatchingFiles and stream that into the downstream ops. @mrry for more ideas.
body: This would be a great feature to have! You're right - currently we wait till the MatchingFilesOp succeeds and we get all the files. One potential idea would be to create an iterator over the output of GetMatchingFiles and stream that into the downstream ops. @mrry for more ideas.
